briefTitle: A Study of ABT-751 in Patients With Recurrent Breast Cancer After Taxane (Taxol or Taxotere) Therapy.
officialTitle: A Phase II Study of ABT-751 in Patients With Breast Cancer Refractory to Taxane Regimens
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Objective Response Rate in subjects with Breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria

* Stage IIIB or IV breast cancer.
* Recurrent tumor after or while on taxane therapy (taxol or taxotere).
* Able to tolerate normal activities of daily living.
* Adequate bone marrow, kidney and liver function.

Exclusion Criteria

* Pregnant or breast feeding.
* No anti-tumor therapy (including hormonal therapy or Herceptin) within 4 weeks of the start of ABT-751 administration.
